eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Cass, MI; at 08:05 AM ON DEC 8, 2025 Effective until 08:20 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required weekly test of the Emergency Alert System for Cass County Michigan. This is only a test. No action required
